title: KARAE
descrption: KARAE is a backdoor typically used by APT37 as first-stage malware. [1]

references.title: FireEye. (2018, February 20). APT37 (Reaper): The Overlooked North Korean Actor. Retrieved March 1, 2018.

related.Name: Drive-by Compromise
related.Use: KARAE was distributed through torrent file-sharing websites to South Korean victims, using a YouTube video downloader application as a lure.[1]

related.Name: Remote File Copy
related.Use: KARAE can upload and download files, including second-stage malware.[1]

related.Name: Web Service
related.Use: KARAE can use public cloud-based storage providers for command and control.[1]
